name: Behind The Skys
description:
Behind The Skys is a Platformer-genre developed by H.H Games.

This game is a Survival game which centers on an Astronaut who went to space on a quest to make few discoveries for his organization CAVILLA, but on his way was caught up by some bad situation on his Jet (Spaceship) leading him to abandoning the ship for safety and to search for a means of completing his task.

In the bid to survive, He finds himself in a wired Sky having to be surrounded with a whole different expectation. Now he has to survive through the miserable sky where he has found himself because every Aliens, Monsters and moving objects have turned against his appearance.

CONTROLS
